story:
When we received our cookie order sheets for my girl scout troop, I noticed a spot to choose to donate a box. I never noticed that before and found that most people were never aware they had the option to donate cookie boxes.  I thought it would be a great chance to collect cookies to send to specific Rochester based military units overseas. 

After starting our "cookies to troops" mission, I found out that when sending donated boxes to a specific place we would have to cover the cost of shipping.  Our troop collected 130 boxes, It was amazing how many people were eager to help out and send a box. We started our troop late but still ended up having a great turnout for our cookies to troops mission.


We are looking for donations to go towards shipping costs. Any bit would help.  The cost to ship the cookies is around $220.00, however the minimum "goal" on this site is $500.00. If by chance we raise more than what is needed we will purchase other items to included in the care packages being sent.  Soldiers look forward to their care packages and we hope to send them out soon so they get them for Christmas.

Thank You!

story:
{My Story}


I spent the last few years in fashion design school, believing that if I was good enough at school and had career and success, I would find fulfillment. Late at night, when riding my bike home through deserted, quiet streets, I would feel a hollowness. With every failing relationship, that hollowness grew.  I was looking for enjoyment and pleasure outside of myself and not finding it.

I came to Orgasmic Meditation because I had a sense that sex had something to do with my chronic dissatisfaction.  That the fulfillment I was seeking resided in the location I was most hesitant to look.  

Two years of OM practice later, I’ve found a new, sustainable source of nourishment.  Where I was once was quiet, passive, and internal, now I have a certainty and confidence in myself.   Where I was meek and shut down, now I speak without apology.  I finally found my voice.  The chronic dissatisfaction has evaporated.  I can thank OM for this.

I want to deepen my practice and teach others how to alleviate their chronic dissatisfaction and live an uncompromised life.  I put down a $1000 deposit for a coach training program that will train me to bring others this practice.  In learning to train others, I will be learning more about myself.  I am looking to YOU to help me raise the rest of the tuition to bring this transformative and life changing work to the world.



{What I Need & What You Get}


I need {$14,000} for Coach training tuition.  The program is ten months long, starting in September 2012.  It's facilitated by a company called OneTaste, whose purpose is to spread turnON and put OM up there with yoga and meditation.  

My gifts to you:

  • OM training-  In three sessions I will train you to OM.  OMing is a partner practice, so if you don’t have a partner, we will work on getting you to a point of asking somebody to OM.  If you can ask somebody to tea, you can ask them to OM.

 

  • Life coaching-  Four sessions where we address what you need to find your life TurnedON and then how you’ll go for it.  You will be part of my learning experience and we will both go on an amazing, possibly scary, hot ride together.  Take the leap of faith and dive in with me.  

 

  • Be a part of #projectOrgasm- Gain access to my interactive blog, #projectOrgasm.  I will be updating daily, with my OM video diary, turnedON songs of the day, frame of sensation tweets, an orgasm photo journal, and more.  You ask me questions, and I do research and report back to you, with video interviews or written posts.  This is the place where I delve into orgasm and report back to you.  

 

  • TurnedON styling and photography-  What does your most turnedON self look like?  What is the *flavor* of your orgasm? Spicy? Sweet? Earthy and dark?  I am a San Francisco native and a fashion designer- so naturally I knows all the shopping spots and places to go, no matter what your interest or style.  

 

  • Personalized tour of SF- As an SF native, I am confident that I can take you on an amazing San Francisco tour. Historical sites, little alcoves only us locals know about, and amazing views and sites to see, and hidden San Francisco oddities.

{Why OM is important for the World}


OM is the [esc] key when the program of your life just isn’t working any more.

OM lights you up.  It gives you spontaneity and flow.  It brings love into your life.  It spurs you to start something new.  It makes you dance.  It helps you talk to their partner.  It encourages your body to go after what you want.  It brings you out of your head and into your body.  It can make you cry and laugh, at the same time.  And the orgasm that lasts fifteen minutes, spills into the rest of your life.  You can live in orgasm, all the time.

I can’t wait to take this coaching program.  With your donations, I can do it.  Through this program, you will help me launch Leah 2.0 and help me bring people their own personal upgrades.


No dough?  You can still contribute!
How? By getting the word out, by sharing!

  • Word of mouth. Free yourself and those around you by talking about sex.
  • Use the indiegogo share tools! Post it on your facebook and start a discussion or share it with friends.

Be a part of #projectOrgasm- Gain access to my interactive blog, #projectOrgasm.  I will be updating daily, with my OM video diary, turnedON songs of the day, frame of sensation tweets, an orgasm photo journal, and more.  You ask me questions, and I do research and report back to you, with video interviews or written posts.  This is the place where I delve into orgasm and report back to you.  
 

TurnedON styling and photography-  What does your most turnedON self look like?  What is the *flavor* of your orgasm? Spicy? Sweet? Earthy and dark?  I am a San Francisco native and a fashion designer- so naturally I knows all the shopping spots and places to go, no matter what your interest or style.  
 

Personalized tour of SF- As an SF native, I am confident that I can take you on an amazing San Francisco tour. Historical sites, little alcoves only us locals know about, and amazing views and sites to see, and hidden San Francisco oddities.

{Why OM is important for the World}
OM is the [esc] key when the program of your life just isn’t working any more. OM lights you up.  It gives you spontaneity and flow.  It brings love into your life.  It spurs you to start something new.  It makes you dance.  It helps you talk to their partner.  It encourages your body to go after what you want.  It brings you out of your head and into your body.  It can make you cry and laugh, at the same time.  And the orgasm that lasts fifteen minutes, spills into the rest of your life.  You can live in orgasm, all the time.I can’t wait to take this coaching program.  With your donations, I can do it.  Through this program, you will help me launch Leah 2.0 and help me bring people their own personal upgrades.No dough?  You can still contribute!How? By getting the word out, by sharing!

story:
My amazing children are my life. I have been fighiting since 2009 in court to keep them in the state of Florida. My ex has devoted her time trying to relocate to Missouri and remove me from their life all together. I need the funds now to pay for court Transcripts nessasary for my appeal. 

 My ex took off with my children in July of 2009 and I didn't see them for almost a year. She returned to Florida only to leave a second time. I battled in Florida and in Missouri in court . I have paid for 4 lawyers. She moved back to Florida and our divorce was final the courts awarded us equal time sharring and my children had both parents half of every week.  This is what I want again to ensure the best life for my children. my Children need both parents. My ex testified in court that she just didn't want me in their lives and produced no evidence as to why. Just that she is their mother and she wants to move. Ahe stated she has a job there and will be living with her family working 5.5 days a week. seeing the children for an hour a day. Her parents would be raising the children.

When here neither of us worked the days we had children to ensure the most time with them.

if they are allowed to leave I would have 75% of the summer break and little more.  thats a far cry fomr equal time.

 Please help me I am a great father and they need me in their life and I need them in mine. I have thousands of friends that will vouch for me and say the same!  Thank you all so much in advance. have one). my

Please spread this to your facebook friends and anyone you think can help. I would usually never ask for help of this manner. However when it comes to my children I am doing anything and everything I can!
